info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:53PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lawrence County through 345 PM MDT... At 252 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Black Fox Campground, or 13 miles south of Lead. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Black Fox Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.
